verbose_text: The increased adhesion of leukocytes to endothelial cells in the retina is associated with increased expression of intercellular adhesion molecule-1 (ICAM-1), vascular cell adhesion molecule-1 (VCAM-1), CD18, and other adhesion molecules, which are upregulated by VEGF and other pro inflammatory molecules in DR and other ocular disorders, and appear to be regulated, at least in part, by protein kinase C (PKC).
